ca.corefacility.gview.map.inputHandler

Class ZoomSubject

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.corefacility.gview.map.event.GViewEventSubjectImp
      • ca.corefacility.gview.map.inputHandler.ZoomSubject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GViewEventListener, GViewEventSubject, java.util.EventListener

    public class ZoomSubject
extends GViewEventSubjectImp
implements GViewEventListener
    Handles zooming in GView. Methods here are called in order to zoom in on the GView map.
    Author:
    Aaron Petkau

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ZoomSubject(GViewMap gViewMap)
      Creates a new ZoomSubject to control zooming on the passed GViewMap.

      • zoomNormalDelta

        public void zoomNormalDelta(double scaleDelta,
                   java.awt.geom.Point2D zoomPoint,
                   PCamera camera)
        Performs a "normal" zoom (scaling every point by the same amount).
        Parameters:
        scaleDelta - The factor we should scale by.
        zoomPoint - The center point for the zoom.
        camera - The camera used to view the GView map.

      • zoomToFactor

        public java.awt.geom.Point2D zoomToFactor(double zoomFactor,
                                 java.awt.geom.Point2D zoomPoint)
        Zooms in to the specified factor. Performs a "stretch" style of zooming.
        Parameters:
        zoomFactor - The scale factor to zoom to.
        zoomPoint - The point we are zooming about.

      • zoomToFactor

        public void zoomToFactor(double zoomFactor,
                SequencePoint seqPoint)
                  throws ZoomException
        Zooms in to the specified factor. Performs a "stretch" style of zooming.
        Parameters:
        zoomFactor - The scale factor to zoom to.
        seqPoint - The point we are zooming about (in terms of sequence coordinates).
        Throws:
        ZoomException
